name: Cart Ways
description:
You are a shopping cart. 

Try to dodge the cones and the cars while you make your way to an endless void of nothingness. You can jump over the cones and the cars though you need incredible skills to jump over the cars. This game was made for Trijam #183 and it's my first completed project in unity. Try and collect as many coins as you can and I might add highscore system in future updates :D

CONTROLS

left arrow to switch to the left lane

right arrow to switch to the right lane

up arrow to jump

thats it

MODEL CREDITS BECAUSE I SUCK AT MAKING THEM

trolley: https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/wip-new-trolley-11c46ff362254a23ab3e241cab1606f7

road and cones: https://github.com/Chaker-Gamra/Endless-Runner-Game/tree/master/Assets/Models
